title: Tym Bessel
text: Tym Bessel, professor of [[Arcane Theory|arcane theory]] at [[Morgrave University]] in [[Sharn]], is one of the predominant scholars in the [[Consensualist Theory|Dominion Theory]] of [[arcane magic]]. Born a [[changeling]] in the [[Dragoneyes]] district of Sharn, Bessel maintains that identity and magic are both things that can be shaped by cultural belief and personal will.
